channel.title: Lookdev on Blue Visual v03
channel.description: Recent content in Lookdev on Blue Visual v03

item.title: Meta Connect 2022
item.description: Overview BUCK was hired by Meta to create graphics for their annual 2022 Connect conference. I was brought on early to help with 3D design and lookdev of certain effects for the project. You can find BUCK’s project page for this here. Lookdev Early on in lookdev, we were trying to create something unique and interesting that had life. We explored many concepts but ultimately landed on projected light across physical, grounded objects.
